title: Conviva Tracking
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is playing back a live, archive, or non-game content 

AND

+ The user is utilizing a proxy software (Charles, Proxyman)
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user reviews the Conviva return in proxy for their current stream

EX:![](index.php?/attachments/get/14374096)
https://268a2000018370f5f35b29272d1942aa2ff7b6a9.ipv4.cws.conviva.com
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe Conviva tags in the contents, and the response section are properly being generated

EX:![](index.php?/attachments/get/14374095)

AND

+ Conviva will report the following:

- Platform Tag (plt) as iOS
- Media Type (med) should be lowercase
- userid
- RSN VideoContentType as RSN

title: playerType
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has proxied their device
+ Has enabled the MLBMediaPlayer feature flag in their app settings
+ Has launched a live or archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the content return from the Conviva url in their proxy software

EX: XXXXXXXXXXXX.cws.conviva.com/0/wsg

AND

+ Enables the Json Text format option
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe the following results:

"playerType": "mpl" = Legacy
"playerType": "mlbMediaPlayer" = MLB

title: Adobe Tracking
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is playing back a live, archive, or non-game content 

AND

+ The user is utilizing a proxy software (Charles, Proxyman)
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user reviews the Adobe return in proxy for their current stream

EX: http://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14374097)
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe Adobe tags in the contents, header section (Filter by Form) are properly being generated

EX: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/14374098)

title: Ad Drop
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Reviewing playback returns from Conviva Pulse, Touchstone 2.0
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should see their current live playback session

AND 

+ The custom events for ad breaks should be generated

title: Launching VOD
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Reviewing playback returns from Conviva Pulse, Touchstone 2.0
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should see their VOD session

AND 

+ The custom events for pre-roll ads are generated

title: Ad Breaks
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Reviewing playback returns from Conviva Pulse, Touchstone 2.0
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should see their current archived playback session

AND 

+ The custom events for ad breaks should be generated
